name: Christmas Subway Art Printable Download
description:
Back by popular demand & on sale! Deck the halls with this cheerful art print for your holiday season! Print it and frame for yourself or use as a quick gift idea! Choose between 5x7, 11x14 or 11x17 printable sizes.

Keep in mind this is a printable download purchase. Once your payment is processed, you'll receive a pdf. file via email for your download poster. It is full color and press ready for any large format printer. 

Merry Christmas to all!

name: Choose your own Experience Printable Download
description:
Give the gift of one-on-one time this Christmas! These are specialty gift cards, one specifically designed for children and another for your sweetheart; both included in one download. The perfect way to create a memory together; let your loved ones choose their own fun experience. Simply print on any cardstock and stuff this card into someone's stocking this holiday! Let the merriment begin!

Please keep in mind, this is a download purchase. Upon payment, you'll be instantly emailed a pdf. file containing both the custom card for kiddos and sweethearts. They are set up on letter size paper with cropmarks, ready for any printer.

name: Ugly Sweater & Egg Nog Printable Download
description:
Host the most memorable shindig of the year! Invite your guests over for egg nog and encourage them to don the most ugly holiday sweater in town. Prizes, rice pudding and a round of karaoke will make the party even better. Eat, sip & be merry!

This is a download purchase. You'll be emailed a pdf. file containing one 5x7 invitation, set up with cropmarks on a letter size paper. Ready to run through any printer. Print, cut and back with festive cardstock. 

Happy Holidays!

name: Burlap Banner Stencil & Template
description: Create a beautiful burlap banner and add a bit of homespun love to your holiday! This do-it-yourself pennant banner takes only a couple of hours and less than $10 to create from start to finish. Please keep in mind, this is a download purchase. Upon payment, you'll be instantly emailed a pdf. file containing a pennant flag template and Christmas word stencils including PEACE, JOY, MERRY, NOEL, CHEER & STAR. Use the stencils again and again! They are set up on a letter size paper, ready to be printed on cardstock. You'll find step-by-step DIY Banner instructions and photos on my blog.

name: AHOY! Nautical Invitation
description: Ahoy! It's a Boy! Baby boy on board? Celebrate the upcoming sailor with a nautical party suited for any first-class mama. Lovely fonts featured in red, gray, and navy hues help this two-sided invitation stand out from the rest. This 5x7 design is printed onto a beautiful luxe paperie and then cut out with a special scalloped edge. For a special touch, metallic silver lined white envelopes complete your order! Please note: a 25 count minimum is required to place an order. This invitation order will include: • your customized text • white (silver-lined) envelopes • 2-sided color design • 2 digital proofs for approval • scallop designer edge included Customize: Please include the names, date, time, place, R.S.V.P. details, and registry information in the Notes to Seller at checkout or in a separate email to martadansie[at]gmail[dot]com. Additional Information: Want to alter this design into a couple's shower invitation or nautical baby announcement? A custom design alteration is available for a fee of $15. Twine bows tied around each card is available for an additional fee of .75 per card. Please note at check-out. Your order will be packaged with care and shipped via USPS Priority shipping.

name: Backyard BBQ Invitation, Set of 8
description:
Amp up your backyard barbecue with festive invites to get everyone in the mood to celebrate warm weather, delicious food, and good company! Fill-in the party details at your leisure and start dreaming up the menu.

These colorful 5x7 invitations are printed on thick paperie with rounded edges. Faux woodgrain, vintage weathered type, and a hand drawn illustration work together to create a unique invitation, perfectly suited for dear old friends.

This invitation order will include: 
• 8 fill-in invitations
• 8 white envelopes

Carefully packaged and shipped via First Class USPS.

name: 50th Wedding Anniversary Invitation
description:
When honoring an important anniversary, this timeless 2-sided invitation design will be a nod to the nostalgic and a magical way to remind the guests of an era gone by. 

Fully personalizing one side of the design with your own classic image (a high resolution jpg. is best) will take the cake while your celebration details will be cleanly featured on the other. (They won't know which way to hang it on the fridge!) This 5x7 invitation is printed on luxurious thick stock and makes a beautiful first impression for an unforgettable event. Please note: a 25 count minimum is required to place an order.

This invitation order will include: 
• your customized text
• monogram in preferred color
• your own wedding portrait
(printed on flip-side of invitation)
• white envelopes
• 2 digital proofs for approval  

Customize: Please include the names, date, time, place, R.S.V.P. details, etc. and the featured photo jpg. in an email to martadansie[at]gmail[dot]com. 

Additional Information:
The silver photo corners pictured are not included. Rounded corners are available for an additional .25 each. Want to use a horizontal photograph instead of a vertical one? I can customize the layout of this design for an additional fee of $15. Printed envelopes are also available, for an additional fee, upon request. Your order will be packaged with care and shipped via USPS Priority shipping.

name: Brunch Invitation Printable Download
description:
Brunch! My favorite meal with girlfriends. Invite your besties, your mom, sisters, and nieces over for a garden tea party on the patio complete with fresh orange juice, embroidered napkins, and warm homemade muffins. Better yet, mail the invitations and meet up at your favorite restaurant! If your gal pals are anything like mine, you may chit chat right on through lunchtime. 

This is a download purchase. Upon payment, you'll be instantly emailed a pdf. file containing one 5x7 invitation with cropmarks along with three circle "Enjoy" favor tags, set up on a letter size paper. It is ready to run through any color printer. Print, cut and party!

name: Kerry June Wedding Suite
description:
One of my all-time favorite designs, this invitation suite is perfect for a bride planning a gorgeous garden wedding with a colorful palate. Beautiful blooms matched with bright, bold hues give the guests the perfect first impression for the upcoming big day. (Suite as pictured includes optional upgrades.)

This design is $5 per invitation. 
Included in your initial price:
• your own customized text
• 2-sided color design on 5x7
• 2 additional inserts of your choice
• outer envelopes
• 2 digital proofs for approval 

Additional upgrades (prices vary):
+ Specialty enclosure envelopes 
+ Metallic envelopes
+ Envelopes for RSVP cards 
+ Return address printed
+ Additional insert cards 
+ Custom color change
+ Calligraphy services
+ Letterpress printing
+ Menus, programs, place cards
+ Event signage, labels, etc. 

Before adding this to your cart, please contact me directly via martadansie[at]gmail[dot]com with your invitation suite request, approximate total of invitations, and any extra changes or inserts you may be interested in and we'll get your order processed. Thank you. A 25 count minimum is required to place an order.

options.name: Please custom order this design by contacting me directly...

name: A Simple Thank You, Set of 6
description:
Send them a heartfelt thank you. These note cards are perfect for every (and any) occasion. Plain and simple, your thanks will be a thoughtful one. Featuring my own handwriting letterpressed in charcoal ink by Hairpin Letterpress in Oregon. These thick 100% cotton cards are a joy to write on and a limited edition!

Paired with an assortment of neon bright envelopes, your sentiment is sure to be a pop of kindness in anyone's mailbox. 

Set of 6 fold-over cards & envelopes (4 Bar size). Carefully packaged and shipped via First Class USPS.

name: Girls Night Out Printable Download
description: Girls just wanna have fun! Next weekend, all your girls will be in town and you've just decided to host a Girls Night Out. Download this Girls Night invite and throw together an evening to remember. All you need is some tasty take-out, pretty polish, and a memorable chick flick from your high school era. Have them bring a favorite thing to swap or dust off your wedding videos for additional entertainment! Upon payment, you'll be instantly emailed a pdf. file containing two 5x7 invitations with cropmarks, set up on a letter size paper. It is ready to run through any color printer. Print, cut and party.

name: Dessert Night Invite, set of 8
description:
Ice cream sundaes, fresh peach cobbler, a towering chocolate cake, blondies, brownies, cookies of all kinds. Gather your friends for a no holds barred night of desserts! Bake up your best and let the frosting fly, this one will be a night to remember.

These extra sweet 5x7 invitations are printed on thick paperie with a special scalloped edge. Pretty pastels, delicate stripes, and a hand drawn illustration whirl together to create a unique invitation, just the right ingredient for an evening of decadent desserts! 

This invitation order will include: 
• 8 fill-in invitations
• 8 white envelopes

Carefully packaged and shipped via First Class USPS.

name: Vintage Hot Air Balloon Invitation
description: Motherhood is the best adventure there is! Create a memorable baby shower with this vintage hot air balloon motif. It is sure to set your party in motion. Whisk her off her feet with a whimsical, feminine and elegant affair; exactly what every mother-to-be needs before her big day! This 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" invitation is printed on a refined linen paperie. Please note: a 25 count minimum is required to place an order. This invitation order will include: • your customized text • white A2 envelopes • 2-sided color design • 2 digital proofs for approval • rounded corners included! Customize: Please include the names, date, time, place, R.S.V.P. details, and registry information in the Notes to Seller at checkout or in a separate email to martadansie[at]gmail[dot]com. Additional Information: A custom design alteration or color change is available for a fee of $15. Please contact me if you're interested in a hot air balloon baby announcement. Your order will be packaged with care and shipped via USPS Priority shipping.

name: Welcome to the World Invitation
description: Welcome to the World, Little One! Create a beautiful baby shower with a vintage vibe of world globes, maps and paper airplanes. This two-sided 5x7 invitation is printed on lovely linen paperie. Send her hopes flying with a warm welcome for the newest addition! This mama-to-be is sure to leave the party walking on air. Please note: a 25 count minimum is required to place an order. This invitation order will include: • your customized text • white envelopes • 2-sided color design • 2 digital proofs for approval Customize: Please include the names, date, time, place, R.S.V.P. details, and registry information in the Notes to Seller at checkout or in a separate email to martadansie[at]gmail[dot]com. Additional Information: Rounded corners are available for an additional .25 each. Would you like to customize this design into a baby announcement? Prefer pink instead? A custom color change is available for a fee of $15. Your order will be packaged with care and shipped via USPS Priority shipping.

name: Handwritten Katherine Wedding Suite
description: Simply stunning. Unlike anything else out there, this invitation suite is custom-made just for you and yours. Featuring my own calligraphy, I work closely with brides to create the specialized hand-lettered invitation they've been dreaming about. These invitations will set the tone for your custom curated wedding while letting your guests know you have a refined sense of style. Whether folksy, vintage or elegant, this suite lends itself to your event. Letterpress or digital press printing available. (Suite as pictured includes optional upgrades.) This suite is approx. $7 per invitation. Included in your initial price: • your own customized text hand lettered in this calligraphy style • 2 additional inserts of your choice • outer envelopes • 2 digital proofs for approval Additional upgrades (prices vary): + Watercolor and dip dying + Specialty enclosure envelopes + Metallic envelopes + Envelopes for RSVP cards + Return address printed + Additional insert cards + Custom color change + Calligraphy services + Letterpress printing + Menus, programs, place cards + Event signage, labels, etc. Before adding this to your cart, please contact me directly via martadansie[at]gmail[dot]com with your invitation suite request, approximate total of invitations, and any extra changes or inserts you may be interested in and we'll get your order processed. Thank you. A 25 count minimum is required to place an order.

name: Personalized Newlywed Note Cards
description: Just Married!! Hunting for the perfect thing for the perfect couple? These personalized note cards make a thoughtful gift for any couple just starting out. Every bride and groom love seeing their name in print! Give them a head start on dozens of thank you notes with their first set of stationery. Please note: a 25 count minimum is required to place an order. This stationery order will include: • bride and groom's names • white envelopes • one-sided flats • 2 digital proofs for approval Additional Information: This flat is a 4.25 x 5.5 ultra thick paperie (your writing goes on the flip-side), however this design is also available in the traditional fold-over card format for .50 extra per card. Please note at check-out. Rounded corners on the flat cards are available for an additional .25 each. Your order will be packaged with care and shipped via USPS Priority shipping. I'll be happy to send your gift straight to the recipients with a note enclosed. Please include their names (and if it's a gift, their shipping address) in Notes to Seller at check out.

name: Woodland Baby Announcement
description: A new blossom on your family tree! Welcome your tiny sprout with this sweet woodsy design. Featuring feathered arrows, pink woodgrain and an Aztec pattern, this announcement is on trend and offers a nice alternative from ruffles, frills and bows. This 5x7 design is printed on a beautiful luxe paperie and then cut out into a unique ornate shape. Please note: a 25 count minimum is required to place an order. This order will include: • your customized text • ornate edging • white envelopes • 2-sided color design • 2 digital proofs for approval Customize: Please include the names, birthdate, stats, etc. in the Notes to Seller at checkout or in a separate email to martadansie[at]gmail[dot]com. Additional Information: Want to alter this design into a baby shower invitation? A custom design alteration is available for a fee of $15. Please note at check-out. Your order will be packaged with care and shipped via USPS Priority shipping.

name: On the Move Address Announcement
description: It's Moving Day! Leave your friends with something bright and cheery to remember you by. A moving truck illustration, terrific type, and clever customizable wording, along with your new address is the best way to keep in touch! The backside can include a happy family candid shot, your blog website, phone numbers and emails or other important information. This unique 5x5 square announcement is printed on luxurious thick paperie. Please note: a 25 count minimum is required to place an order. This order will include: • your customized text • white envelopes • 2-sided color design • 2 digital proofs for approval Customize: Please include the names, details, new address, etc. in a separate email to martadansie[at]gmail[dot]com. Additional Information: Rounded corners are available for an additional .25 each. Please let me know which of the color choices you prefer in Notes to Seller at checkout. Be sure to check with your local post office, square envelopes require a bit more postage.Your order will be packaged with care and shipped via USPS Priority shipping.

name: Farm Fresh Baby Announcement
description: Our little brother is here! Welcoming an addition to your funny farm!? This design allows the whole clan to help announce your new tiny one. This cleverly cute announcement is printed on luxurious thick paperie. Please note: a 25 count minimum is required to place an order. This order will include: • your customized text • white envelopes • 2-sided color design • 1 digital proof for approval Additional Information: Pictured here is a 4.25 x 5.5 flat, however this design is also available in a 5x7 (same price) announcement size. Please note your preference at check-out. Rounded corners are available for an additional .25 each. Prefer a chocolate shade instead? A custom color change is available for a fee of $15. Your order will be packaged with care and shipped via USPS Priority shipping.

Originally designed for my best friend, this suite is lovely and still laid back. This invitation features a fun mix of typography, lowercase lettering, and is full of personality, yet not too formal. A thoughtful minimal design is ideal for any couple with understated style. Colors can be changed to match your own event. (Suite as pictured includes optional upgrades ie. fold-over card with wax seal additions.)

name: Celebrating 25 Years Invitation
description:
When celebrating a big anniversary, especially in the business world, a pretty party invitation is the best way to catch the eye of your clientele.  

This design is classic and easily pairs with any theme your party planning committee has in mind! As a bonus, the backside can be tastefully customized with your own company's logo. This 5x7 invitation is printed on luxurious thick stock and makes a beautiful first impression for an unforgettable special event. Please note: a 25 count minimum is required to place an order.

This invitation order will include: 
• your customized text
• your own logo feature
• white (silver-lined) envelopes
• 2 digital proofs for approval  

Customize: Please include the names, date, time, place, R.S.V.P. details, etc. in the Notes to Seller at checkout or in a separate email to martadansie[at]gmail[dot]com. 

Additional Information:
Rounded corners are available for an additional .25 each. Printed envelopes are also available, for an additional fee, upon request. Your order will be packaged with care and shipped via USPS Priority shipping.

name: Laura Jane Wedding Suite
description:
This refined suite design is a classic choice for any elegant and polished party. Complete with sophisticated type and ornate elements, this suite lends itself well for guest programs, menu descriptions, lists and map directions. 

The pretty pieces remain cohesive with the luxe paperie and exquisite typography tying them all together, helping create an unforgettable event. (Suite as pictured includes optional upgrades.)

This design is $5 per invitation. 
Included in your initial price:
• your own customized text

name: Autumn Bucket List Download or Art Print
description:
Say farewell to summer and hello to fall! Embrace the season with a cozy cup of cider and a bucket list of family activities. Frame it for a decoration or roll it up and tie with twine to create charming invitations.

DOWNLOAD PRINTABLE $5: This is a download purchase and available in four color options. Upon payment, you'll be instantly emailed a pdf. file containing one 8x10 bucket list design with cropmarks, set up on letter size paper. It is ready to run through any color printer. 

ART PRINT $12: This print is available in four color options. The 8x10 designs are printed on luxe archival paper and delivered straight to you. First class USPS shipping is included in this price (domestic only).

Please contact me if you're interested in ordering a different size. This design is for your personal use and enjoyment, but please respect the copyright. This item is not for resale. Thank you!

name: Scalloped Party Garland
description:
Pretty up your party! Swoop these sweet scalloped garlands in your home to deck your halls and liven up any special event. Handmade with fine paper and twine, they are double-sided and lovely from all angles. These paperie scallops do not bump and slide along the string. 

Out of the package, they come ready to hang in windows, onto bookcases, mantels, tables, outdoors or around your Christmas tree. With care, your party garlands can be enjoyed again and again. The total length of this garland is approximately 6 feet long, with extra twine at the ends for tying. (Vintage world map design is pictured.) 

Assorted paperie themes available
• Vintage maps 
(USA, Europe, World, NY, Paris)
• polka dots, hearts
• faux wood, macarons
• Gold, silver, or white glitter paper

Please describe your preference in the Notes to Seller at checkout and I'll try to meet your custom party garland needs. Carefully packaged and shipped via first class USPS.
